intro.description: Welcome to the Careers page of Sweden Relocators! We're excited to offer a variety of career opportunities. Our commitment to excellence in relocation and workforce management means we are always seeking talented individuals who share our passion. Join us in making a difference for people and businesses around the globe.

positions.title: Immigration Consultant
positions.summary: As an Immigration Consultant, you'll guide clients through the immigration process, provide visa assistance, and ensure compliance with Swedish regulations.
responsibilities: Stay updated on immigration law changes
requirements: Minimum 3 years in immigration or relocation services

positions.title: Payroll Specialist
positions.summary: The Payroll Specialist oversees payroll processing for clients, ensuring compliance and benefit management.
requirements: Payroll experience, ideally in international contexts

positions.title: Client Support Coordinator
positions.summary: The Client Support Coordinator will manage client relations, providing top-notch service and support.
responsibilities: Handle client inquiries and provide solutions
Track client feedback and coordinate with teams
requirements: Ability to problem-solve and act proactively

applicationForm.heading: Application Form
applicationForm.description: To apply for a position, please fill out the form below with your details. We look forward to reviewing your application!

whyJoin.heading: Why Join Sweden Relocators?
whyJoin.description: Sweden Relocators offers an innovative, collaborative work environment focused on growth, inclusion, and excellence. Here are some of the benefits of working with us:

benefits.title: Professional Growth
benefits.description: Access to continuous learning opportunities and career advancement pathways

benefits.title: Flexible Work Options
benefits.description: Remote and hybrid roles available for select positions

benefits.title: Inclusive Culture
benefits.description: Work with a team that values diversity and collaboration

benefits.title: Competitive Benefits
benefits.description: Comprehensive health, retirement, and wellness plans

benefits.title: Global Impact
benefits.description: Be part of a team that makes a positive difference for individuals and businesses worldwide
